function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Integration of smart city technologies with pandemic response","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 disease in healthcare sectors","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in implementing 5g technologies for healthcare","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Re-emergence of covid-19 due to relaxed control mechanisms","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper handling of sensitive personal data in remote monitoring and contact tracing solutions.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay or prevention of timely healthcare access due to technical solutions.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Legal issues arising from the complex environment of 5g-enabled smart devices for e-health.","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conspiracy linking 5g and covid-19 leading to disrupted connectivity","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Technical literacy requirement for 5g solutions","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Resistance and deterrence of health personnel from using new e-health systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited deployment of 5g networks and limited availability of 5g devices","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complexity and implementation issues of 5g devices, including power consumption and multi-band support","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incidents of destroying cellular base stations due to conspiracy theories linking 5g networks and the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased network congestion due to rapid deployment of new healthcare applications and increased number of 5g users","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in managing billions of miots generating ad hoc data transfers","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited connectivity challenges in 5g deployment","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Adversaries attacking databases with sensitive information pose security risks.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of miot increases security risks of healthcare systems, making them vulnerable to dos attacks.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Massive connected devices increase the attack surface for unauthorized operations on the healthcare system.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Personal information disclosed in telemedicine sessions","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Automated contact tracing applications aggregating sensitive location data without user consent","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and transparency about data sharing and privacy risks in e-health technology","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to inadequate monitoring and compliance of self-isolation.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Privacy protection issues related to the collection and transfer of sensitive health data via wearable devices and cloud networks.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scalability and resource demand challenges for 5g-enabled healthcare applications, including contact tracing and monitoring.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Manual contact tracing is ineffective in identifying all possible close contacts, hindering the effectiveness of contact tracing.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Pure gps-based contact tracing solutions lack the accuracy to identify close contacts within a few meters.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Delivery of items via beyond line-of-sight blos uav may lead to technological failures or errors, increasing the risk of delayed or inaccurate deliveries.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mobile device-based self-isolation monitoring may be susceptible to data breaches, compromising the privacy and security of the individuals’ location and health information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uav-based monitoring of covid-19 patients may raise concerns regarding personal privacy and consent for data collection and surveillance.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of raw materials and labor force disrupts regular production","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imbalance of supply for essential goods like n95 masks and hand sanitizers","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delivery concerns due to covid-19 spread and physical contact restrictions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on 5g for hosting network functions may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases if the network is not adequately secured or maintained.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Imbalance in the supply chain for healthcare products such as ppe, ventilators, and drugs could lead to shortages, increasing the risk of healthcare workers and patients being exposed to contagious diseases.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection of covid-19 patient data from different healthcare centers","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Making covid-19 patient data available to the public","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Live video conferencing for healthcare professionals and patients","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through shared healthcare environments.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ultra-dense small cell networks may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases in indoor environments.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High data rates for a large number of served users may lead to overcrowding in indoor environments, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of resources in healthcare facilities due to existing covid-19 patients","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Strict requirements and sophisticated underlying technologies for teleservices","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Need to minimize the risk of healthcare professionals getting exposed to covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to
